comment: Every (possibly proper) subclass of a class ` A ` with a founded, partial-ordering, set-like relation ` R ` has a minimal element. The additional condition of partial ordering over ~ frmin enables avoiding infinity. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2022.)
